topic.title: Cross Sectional Model: Define Hydraulic Conductivity Parameters

para.text: Cross Sectional Model: Define Hydraulic Conductivity Parameters
The confining bed has a hydraulic conductivity of 10

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:8pt; vertical-align:super; color:#000000;

para.text: m/s. The rest of the layers have hydraulic conductivities of 10

text.style: font-family:'Times New Roman'; font-size:8pt; vertical-align:super; color:#000000;

para.text: m/s. We will define these values using parameters. Select "Model|MODFLOW Packages and Programs..." On the pane for the LPF package, change the number of HK parameters to 2. Set the values of the two parameters to 1E-4 and 1E-7 respectively. Check the Use Zones checkboxes for both parameters. Click OK.
